# MTV Europe Music Award for Best Asia and Pacific Act

The following is a list of the MTV Europe Music Award winners and nominees for Best Asia and Pacific Act.
2010's
{| class="wikitable"
! Year !! Winner !! Nominees

| 2011 ||  Big Bang
||
